question.query: of the memecoins with the highest mindshare growth, which assets have the best catalysts and narrative sustainability potential?

steps.text:
[
  {
    "type": "text",
    "text": "![PsyopAnime Price Spike and Elon Musk Social Media Impact](https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1768290137/veldt/ldjuo30zkyy6hojtqkig.jpg)

Mindshare growth is cheap; **sustainable mindshare** needs either (1) repeatable content/product loops, (2) reflexive distribution (CEX/perp venues), or (3) credible supply sinks. From the current high mindshare-growth set, only a few have catalysts that don’t decay in 48–72 hours.

## Best catalysts + highest narrative sustainability

**1) Useless Coin (USELESS)**  
- **Catalyst quality:** **Coinbase listing** is the only “permanent distribution” catalyst in this cohort. It creates recurring retail inflows every time memes rotate risk-on.  
- **Sustainability:** The meme is *anti-narrative* (“useless”) which paradoxically holds up longer than story-memes because it doesn’t require shipping. The best version of this trade is **USELESS as beta to SOL meme cycles**.

**2) Fartcoin (FARTCOIN)**  
- **Catalyst quality:** **Derivatives expansion** (e.g., leveraged markets, Hyperliquid ticker auction activity) keeps it in the “tradable majors” bucket and refreshes attention with every venue addition.  
- **Sustainability:** Strong as a **mainstream meme index component**. It survives because it’s liquid, ubiquitous, and easy to express size in—less because the joke stays funny.

**3) PsyopAnime (PsyopAnime)**  
- **Catalyst quality:** A high-impact attention shock (celebrity amplification) plus a format that can iterate: **viral AI-anime shorts**.  
- **Sustainability:** Only if the team can **ship viral episodes at a cadence**. If output slows, mindshare mean-reverts fast. Treat as a *content studio*, not a static meme.

## Good catalysts, weaker “memecoin purity” (still tradable)

**Mia Ko (MIA)**  
- **Catalyst:** **Minecraft integration** + explicit **buyback/burn intent funded by creator rewards**.  
- **Sustainability:** Stronger than most microcaps because it’s anchored to a product loop, but it’s closer to **AI-agent consumer** than pure meme.

**MetaDAO (META)**  
- **Catalyst:** Continuous “event surface area” via **futarchy proposals/ICOs/burn votes**.  
- **Sustainability:** Not really a memecoin; it’s an ecosystem token with recurring governance drama (which is still a narrative engine).

## Low sustainability / avoid as “catalyst-driven holds”
**MELANIA** (headline-driven, heavy historical overhang), **Zerebro** (founder-driven performance art; reflexive but fragile).

If you force a ranking for **memecoin + catalysts + durability**: **USELESS > FARTCOIN > PsyopAnime**, with **MIA** as the best “meme-adjacent” product loop.",
    "providerMetadata": {
      "openai": {
        "itemId": "msg_0c9af2369f55cd7c006966b7267874819e8e7d2dc86f601ad1"
      }
    }
  }
]

agentResult.finalAnswer:
![PsyopAnime Price Spike and Elon Musk Social Media Impact](https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1768290137/veldt/ldjuo30zkyy6hojtqkig.jpg)

Mindshare growth is cheap; **sustainable mindshare** needs either (1) repeatable content/product loops, (2) reflexive distribution (CEX/perp venues), or (3) credible supply sinks. From the current high mindshare-growth set, only a few have catalysts that don’t decay in 48–72 hours.

## Best catalysts + highest narrative sustainability

**1) Useless Coin (USELESS)**  
- **Catalyst quality:** **Coinbase listing** is the only “permanent distribution” catalyst in this cohort. It creates recurring retail inflows every time memes rotate risk-on.  
- **Sustainability:** The meme is *anti-narrative* (“useless”) which paradoxically holds up longer than story-memes because it doesn’t require shipping. The best version of this trade is **USELESS as beta to SOL meme cycles**.

**2) Fartcoin (FARTCOIN)**  
- **Catalyst quality:** **Derivatives expansion** (e.g., leveraged markets, Hyperliquid ticker auction activity) keeps it in the “tradable majors” bucket and refreshes attention with every venue addition.  
- **Sustainability:** Strong as a **mainstream meme index component**. It survives because it’s liquid, ubiquitous, and easy to express size in—less because the joke stays funny.

**3) PsyopAnime (PsyopAnime)**  
- **Catalyst quality:** A high-impact attention shock (celebrity amplification) plus a format that can iterate: **viral AI-anime shorts**.  
- **Sustainability:** Only if the team can **ship viral episodes at a cadence**. If output slows, mindshare mean-reverts fast. Treat as a *content studio*, not a static meme.

## Good catalysts, weaker “memecoin purity” (still tradable)

**Mia Ko (MIA)**  
- **Catalyst:** **Minecraft integration** + explicit **buyback/burn intent funded by creator rewards**.  
- **Sustainability:** Stronger than most microcaps because it’s anchored to a product loop, but it’s closer to **AI-agent consumer** than pure meme.

**MetaDAO (META)**  
- **Catalyst:** Continuous “event surface area” via **futarchy proposals/ICOs/burn votes**.  
- **Sustainability:** Not really a memecoin; it’s an ecosystem token with recurring governance drama (which is still a narrative engine).

## Low sustainability / avoid as “catalyst-driven holds”
**MELANIA** (headline-driven, heavy historical overhang), **Zerebro** (founder-driven performance art; reflexive but fragile).

If you force a ranking for **memecoin + catalysts + durability**: **USELESS > FARTCOIN > PsyopAnime**, with **MIA** as the best “meme-adjacent” product loop.

parameters.instructions: Memecoins with the highest mindshare growth in the last 24h-7d; prioritize strong mentions_change_24h and mentions_change_7d, minimum liquidity $200k, market cap $5m-$500m. Return top 25 across major chains (no chain restriction).

parameters.semantic_query: PsyopAnime SOLO Mia Ko ZERA Fartcoin Useless Coin memecoin catalysts upcoming releases listings integrations buybacks burns roadmap

standardAgentConfig.instructions:
Role: crypto research assistant

        Tools: 'webSearch'

        Utilize web search capabilities to find accurate, current information about crypto projects, trends, and markets.

        Your objective is to be a user's crypto research assistant. Answer the user's question as best as you can
